Package org.stefan.tuc.dao

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
org.stefan.tuc.dao.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - A generic class called Type, denoted by T.
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
Represents the "abstract" class which performs the CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations on the tables found in the database.
